bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. of water evil abiding in the human body. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 7: 小黃酒，治風虛痰癖， 四肢偏枯，兩脚弱，手不能上頭。或小腹縮痛，脅下攣急，心下有伏水 , “Ordinary yellow wine cures wind depletion with phlegm aggregation-illness,unilateral withering of any of the four limbs, weakness of both legs, inability to raise the hands above the head, in some cases with a contracting pain, cramps and tightness below the flanks, and the presence of hidden water below the heart”.
